text: I have created a API template for jmeter we can add it in jmeter system please let me know the procedure for getting it validated and approved
creator: itskumarsurinder@gmail.com

text:
Hello,
Thanks for your proposal, you can have the procedure here:

- https://github.com/apache/jmeter/blob/trunk/CONTRIBUTING.md


Regards
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text:
Hello All,

I have created a template for jmeter with the help of that we can test the bulk API, i am attaching the code(.jmx) file, flow document for review, please let me know if i can help you to explain more or can update something in this template as per your requirements. 

As per my understanding its helpful for users to test bulk API, If you think it will be useful for users as other template like recording template etc. So please add in jmeter.
creator: itskumarsurinder@gmail.com
itskumarsurinder@gmail.com
